snippet: Barnes & Noble's Nook unit suffered a 12.6 percent decline in sales compared with the same period a year earlier, a blow to its hopes of building up its digital division to compete with behemoths like Amazon.com and Apple.
abstract: Barnes & Noble's Nook unit suffered a 12.6 percent decline in sales compared with the same period a year earlier, a blow to its hopes of building up its digital division to compete with behemoths like Amazon.com and Apple.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble's Strategy In Question as Holiday Nook Sales Decline
